title: Share of small loans rises, thanks to small finance banks - Economic Times
content: Share of small loans rises, thanks to small finance banks  Economic Times
description: In the past three-and-a-half years, SFBs have delivered robust 42 per cent compound annual growth rate (CAGR) followed by private banks at 13 per cent and foreign banks 8 per cent while loan growth for public sector banks was the lowest at 2 per cent during the same period.
